trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Tucson
There were no other sightings in Tucson on or around May 12th 2012
Summary: object flew from west to east in straight line with no sound in under 3 min then just vanished
divs: sighting detailsobject flew from west to east in straight line with no sound in under 3 min then just vanished. my mother and i were in the back yard talking when we noticed a spherical object flying. we tried to identify it, but were unsuccessful. we were amazed that there was no accompanying sound. our first thought was maybe a helicopter, then meteor due to the lack of sound. it was a very bright orange\red color and moved incredibly fast. it didn't appear to get closer to the ground, just vanished. since we live close to the base, we are used to seeing planes and helicopters, and this was neither. mom ran in to get binoculars and it was gone by the time she returned a min. later.
